item.title: Will add a quote by Matt Groening
item.description: "Love is a snowmobile racing across the tundra and then suddenly it flips over, pinning you underneath. At night, the ice weasels come." -- Matt Groening

item.title: Will add a quote by Samuel Beckett
item.description: "All of old. Nothing else ever. Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try again. Fail again. Fail better." -- Samuel Beckett

item.title: Will add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "This is your life and its ending one moment at a time." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Will add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Finish each day and be done with it. You have done what you could. Some blunders and absurdities no doubt crept in; forget them as soon as you can. Tomorrow is a new day. You shall begin it serenely and with too high a spirit to be encumbered with your old nonsense." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Will add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Will add a quote by Ernest Cline
item.description: "You'd be amazed how much research you can get done when you have no life whatsoever." -- Ernest Cline

item.title: Will add a quote by Ernest Cline
item.description: "People who live in glass houses should shut the fuck up." -- Ernest Cline

item.title: Will add a quote by Ernest Cline
item.description: "Being human totally sucks most of the time. Videogames are the only thing that make life bearable." -- Ernest Cline

item.title: Will add a quote by Ernest Cline
item.description: "I watched a lot of YouTube videos of cute geeky girls playing '80s cover tunes on ukuleles. Technically, this wasn't part of my research, but I had a serious cute-geeky-girls-playing-ukuleles fetish that I can neither explain nor defend." -- Ernest Cline
